title: Mistral Roars Back With Frontier AI Family That Goes Head to Head With DeepSeek
description: French startup Mistral releases a 4-model AI family, challenging DeepSeek with frontier performance and EU data sovereignty for enterprises wary of Chinese alternatives.
content: French AI startup Mistral, often dismissed as the European underdog in a field dominated by American giants and Chinese upstarts, just caught up: It dropped its most ambitious release yet on Tuesday … [+4619 chars]
